item.title: A Deal's a Deal
item.description: “Am I not allowed to do what I choose with what belongs to me?

item.title: Dollars and Percents
item.description: Think in terms of dollars whenever it matters and percentages when it doesn’t.

item.title: What to Sell
item.description: Build a data scraper. Then you can sell: a copy of the scraper access to the scraper the scraper source code the output of the scraper (scraped data)

item.title: Home-Buying Process
item.description: What We Did First, we budgeted. We planned for single income, and decided to be conservative in calculating our home affordability because we know the likelihood of unexpected cheap or free stuff is a lot lower than unexpected costs and fees.
